#summary Supplementary Motor Cortex

This page covers biological details of component Supplementary Motor Cortex.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Cortex -> Anterior Lobe (NC.LOBE.ANT) -> Supplementary Motor Cortex (NMA.NC.SMC) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: cortex
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaNMA Neocortical Brain - Motor Aggregation Area]
  * *Brodmann ID*: 06
  * *Role*: processor
  * *Function*: Process sequences of movements and coordinate bilateral movements

= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * *Supplementary Eye Field* (*MCA.NC.SMC.SEF*): high level aspects of saccade control
  * *Pre-Supplementary Motor Area* (*MCA.NC.SMC.F6*): Numerical and verbal mental-operation tasks
  * *Supplementary Motor Area* (*MCA.NC.SMC.F3*): Numerical and verbal mental-operation tasks
